page.title: 13Education Flintham/Syerston.
page.content: Altogether 80 children attend{Flintham {Primary School,}11 from Flintham, 13 from Syerston, 7 from Screveton and the rest from RAF Syerston. With the headmaster there is 1 part time and 3 full time{staff}teaching 3 classes aged from under five to eleven years. The ancilliary staff comprises a care- taker, 2 lunchtime supervisors and a secretary. The school{premises}are split and use The Old School built in the 1870's and a newer building across the road where there are two classrooms, a dining room and staff room. The school building is maintained by the LEA but is available for village functions after school. School starts at 9.00 am finishing at 3.15 pm with a lunch break when food is delivered from Toothill School at Bingham.
